item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: We're more thanwine makers.
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: Button Text

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: A winery that reimagines winemaking to create something fresh, modern, and full of energy.

item.title: Terra Del Capo
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded:
Groenekloof (36%) provides the fresh acidity and structure with beautiful citrus flavours; Elandskloof (26%) abounds in fresh apple and lively acid; Franschhoek (26%) and Stellenbosch (12%) both contribute riper peach - and melon flavours which ass body and depth to the wine
Technical Information Average Temperature: 22C Rainfall: 900 mm Harvesting Began: 12/01/2015 Harvesting Ended: 05/03/2015
item.excerpt:encoded: This classic Pinot Grigio is sourced from 4 different regions in the Western Cape, each contributing its own individual character when blended together.

item.title: Anthonij Rupert
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded:
Grapes are picked by hand, placed into small lug boxes and transported to the cellar in a refrigerated truck. In the cellar, the whole berries are manually double sorted and then gravity fed into fermenters. Each batch is cold soaked for a few days and then slowly brought up in temperature. Fermentation takes place naturally. The wines were aged for 24 months in 100% new French oak, bottled unfiltered and bottle aged for 24 months.
Technical Information Average Temperature: 17.97C Rainfall: 918,15mm Harvesting began: 23/02/2009 Harvesting ended: 12/03/2009
item.excerpt:encoded: The vineyards for this specific blend were chosen from our best sites. The L'Ormarins vineyards with the decomposed granite supplied the richness and fullness to the wine.

item.title: L'Ormarins Brut Classiqee
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded:
Grapes are picked by hand, placed into small lug boxes and transported to the cellar in a refrigerated truck. In the cellar, the whole berries are manually double sorted and then gravity fed into fermenters. Each batch is cold soaked for a few days and then slowly brought up in temperature. Fermentation takes place naturally. The wines were aged for 24 months in 100% new French oak, bottled unfiltered and bottle aged for 24 months.
Technical Information Average Temperature: 17.97C Rainfall: 918,15mm Harvesting began: 23/02/2009 Harvesting ended: 12/03/2009
item.excerpt:encoded: The vineyards for this specific blend were chosen from our best sites. The L'Ormarins vineyards with the decomposed granite supplied the richness and fullness to the wine.
